0.3 (2012-06-07)
----------------

- Bugfix: the once parameter for checkPayment now works as expected


0.2 (2012-02-23)
----------------

- Fixed a bug that prevented the correct handling of a successful Ideal response
- Fixed a bug that prevented the test parameter from working correctly


0.1 (2012-02-19)
----------------
- Initial release with Ideal support
